title: [Self-Directed] Exploring MOOC Teaching Experiences: Mixed-Methods Research-Based Instructional Design for Pre-Service Teachers

context.additional_context: MOOC Teaching Experience Analysis and Application Course for Pre-Service/In-Service Teachers in Future Online Education Design

learning_goals: Students can explain at least three primary motivating factors for MOOC instructors (interest, promotion, incentives).
Students can design a procedure for analyzing MOOC teaching experiences using mixed research methods (surveys and interviews).
Students can propose strategies to improve online learning environments by comparing qualitative differences between MOOCs and face-to-face education.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
